name: Witcher Arena Demo
description:
Its Small game in Witcher Universe made by me. Its my first game made just by my own. Take your Witcher sword and destroy Skeleton warriors on the Arena !

How start?

Buy some potion useing 1 or 2 on Num keybourd.

Use Sword Left click

Use Magic Right click

Movement W,A,S,D

+ Space

Use Blue light to start Fight!
